other_tests.findings: A new, moderate right pleural effusion with adjacent atelectasis; Multiple contiguous loops of small bowel are fluid-filled and dilated, increased in comparison to the prior study; The appendix remains enlarged and inflamed with a small adjacent rim-enhancing fluid collection compatible with an abscess at the base, smaller in comparison to the prior examination, but now more organized.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The fluid-filled and dilated small bowel was increased in size compared to the prior study; the adjacent abscess was smaller and more organized compared to the previous examination.
